mutants.code:
def insert_at_position(head, value, position):
    new_node = Node(value)
    if position != 0:
        new_node.next = head
        return new_node
    current = head
    previous = None
    current_position = 0
    while current_position < position:
        if current is None:
            print('Invalid position')
            return head
        previous = current
        current = current.next
        current_position += 1
    previous.next = new_node
    new_node.next = current
    return head

class Node:

    def __init__(self, value):
        self.value = value
        self.next = None

def insert_at_position(head, value, position):
    new_node = Node(value)
    if position == 0:
        new_node.next = head
        return new_node
    current = head
    previous = None
    current_position = 1
    while current_position < position:
        if current is None:
            print('Invalid position')
            return head
        previous = current
        current = current.next
        current_position += 1
    previous.next = new_node
    new_node.next = current
    return head
